SELECT ROWNUM RN , T1.* FROM( SELECT A.LIC_GRP_ID AS LIC_GRP_ID , A.PRJ_GRP_ID AS PRJ_GRP_ID , A.PRJ_ID AS PRJ_ID , A.STRG_REP_ID AS STRG_REP_ID , A.AUTH_GRP_ID AS AUTH_GRP_ID , A.AUTH_TYPE_CD AS AUTH_TYPE_CD , B.USR_IMG_ID AS USR_IMG_ID , B.USR_NM AS USR_NM , B.EMAIL AS EMAIL , SF_STM6000_DEPT_NM(A.LIC_GRP_ID, B.DEPT_ID, '2') AS DEPT_NM , C.AUTH_GRP_NM AS AUTH_GRP_NM , D.PRJ_NM AS PRJ_NM , E.PRJ_NM AS PRJ_GRP_NM FROM STM8200 A LEFT JOIN STM3000 B ON (A.AUTH_TYPE_CD = '02' AND B.USR_ID = A.AUTH_GRP_ID ) LEFT JOIN PRJ2000 C ON ( C.LIC_GRP_ID = A.LIC_GRP_ID AND C.PRJ_ID = A.PRJ_ID AND C.USE_CD = '01' AND A.AUTH_TYPE_CD = '01' AND C.AUTH_GRP_ID = A.AUTH_GRP_ID ) LEFT JOIN PRJ1000 D ON ( D.PRJ_ID = A.PRJ_ID ) LEFT JOIN PRJ1000 E ON ( E.PRJ_ID = A.PRJ_GRP_ID ) WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND A.STRG_REP_ID = #strgRepId# AND B.USE_CD = '01' AND C.USE_CD = '01' AND D.USE_CD = '01' AND E.USE_CD = '01' ORDER BY AUTH_GRP_ID ASC ) T1 WHERE 1 = 1
AND T1.AUTH_GRP_NM = #searchTargetData#

SELECT ROWNUM RN , T1.* FROM( SELECT A.LIC_GRP_ID AS LIC_GRP_ID , A.PRJ_GRP_ID AS PRJ_GRP_ID , A.PRJ_ID AS PRJ_ID , A.STRG_REP_ID AS STRG_REP_ID , A.AUTH_GRP_ID AS AUTH_GRP_ID , A.AUTH_TYPE_CD AS AUTH_TYPE_CD , B.USR_IMG_ID AS USR_IMG_ID , B.USR_NM AS USR_NM , B.EMAIL AS EMAIL , SF_STM6000_DEPT_NM(A.LIC_GRP_ID, B.DEPT_ID, '2') AS DEPT_NM , C.AUTH_GRP_NM AS AUTH_GRP_NM , D.PRJ_NM AS PRJ_NM , E.PRJ_NM AS PRJ_GRP_NM FROM STM8200 A LEFT JOIN STM3000 B ON (A.AUTH_TYPE_CD = '02' AND B.USR_ID = A.AUTH_GRP_ID ) LEFT JOIN PRJ2000 C ON ( C.LIC_GRP_ID = A.LIC_GRP_ID AND C.PRJ_ID = A.PRJ_ID AND C.USE_CD = '01' AND A.AUTH_TYPE_CD = '01' AND C.AUTH_GRP_ID = A.AUTH_GRP_ID ) LEFT JOIN PRJ1000 D ON ( D.PRJ_ID = A.PRJ_ID ) LEFT JOIN PRJ1000 E ON ( E.PRJ_ID = A.PRJ_GRP_ID ) WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND A.STRG_REP_ID = #strgRepId# AND B.USE_CD = '01' AND C.USE_CD = '01' AND D.USE_CD = '01' AND E.USE_CD = '01' AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT F.AUTH_GRP_ID AS AUTH_GRP_ID FROM STM8200 F WHERE 1 = 1 AND F.LIC_GRP_ID = A.LIC_GRP_ID AND F.PRJ_ID = A.PRJ_ID AND F.STRG_REP_ID = A.STRG_REP_ID ) ORDER BY AUTH_GRP_ID ASC ) T1
AND T1.AUTH_GRP_NM LIKE '%'|| #searchTargetData# ||'%'
AND T1.AUTH_TYPE_CD = #searchTargetData#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO STM8200 ( LIC_GRP_ID, PRJ_GRP_ID, PRJ_ID ,STRG_REP_ID, AUTH_TYPE_CD, AUTH_GRP_ID ,REG_DTM, REG_USR_ID, REG_USR_IP ,MODIFY_DTM, MODIFY_USR_ID, MODIFY_USR_IP ) VALUES ( #licGrpId#, #prjGrpId#, #prjId# ,#strgRepId#, #authTypeCd#, #authGrpId# ,SYSDATE, #regUsrId#, #regUsrIp# ,SYSDATE, #modifyUsrId#, #modifyUsrIp# )

AND A.PRJ_GRP_ID = #prjGrpId#
